content.title: Injuries
content.text:
Injuries inflicted on your characte will have a varying effect on their abilities based on where the injury occurs.
* Being shot in one leg you will not be able to run. * Being shot in both legs you will not be able to walk at all. * Damage taken with less than 20 HP or less than 40 HP for in a car will give you a 66% chance of fainting. * Being shot in one arm you will be unable to aim their weapon accurately. * Being shot in both arms you will be unable to fire your weapon.
To treat an injury you must seek medical help by calling 911 from a cellphone or visiting All Saints General Hospital.
